metadata.title: CVE-2022-32317 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: The MPlayer Project v1.5 was discovered to contain a heap use-after-freeresulting in a double free in the preinit function at libvo/vo_v4l2.c. Thisvulnerability can lead to a Denial of Service (DoS) via a crafted file. Thedevice=strdup statement is not executed on every call.

criterions.comment: mplayer package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
